# OpenABC-D: A Large-Scale Dataset For Machine Learning Guided Integrated Circuit Synthesis 
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-1.0.0-brightgreen)](https://github.com/NYU-MLDA/OpenABC) 
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-BSD%203--Clause-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)

## Overview

**OpenABC-D** is a large-scale labeled dataset generated by synthesizing open source hardware IPs using state-of-art open source logic synthesis tool **yosys-abc**

We considered 29 open-source hardware IP designs
